attributes.action: MAKE ALL MPs FINANCIAL (On and OFF SHORE) BUSINESS COMPLEYELY PUBLIC
attributes.additional_details:
ALL MPs Should be made to be completely to have TRANSPARENT FINANCES.
ALL MONIES SHOULD BE VIEWABLE + NONE REDACTABLE.
ALL "TRIPS ABROAD " SHOULD BE COSTED PRIOR TO GOING AS SHOULD ANY "COMPANION"ACCOMPANYING THEM.
ANY AND ALL GIFTS TO BE GIVEN OVER TO TO PUBLIC PURSE(NO FREEBIES).
ALL OPEN TO SIX MONTHLY REVIEW.
ANY VESTED INTEREST AND LOBBYING TO BE LIMITED TO NONE PROFITABLE (FOR MPs) UNTIL THEY LEAVE OFFICE.
WELSH TAX OFFICE TO BE ABOLISHED, AND MPs PAYE TAX LIKE EVERYONE ELSE.
MPs also OPEN TO PRISON SENTENCES AS WELL AS UK CITIZENS.
COMPLETE OPENESS REGARDING FINANCES
